name: Chippy and The Golden Acorn (GMTK-Jam-2017)
description:
Chippy and The Golden Acorn 

 
In Chippy And The Golden Acorn, you help Chippy the chipmunk find the Golden Acorn, so he can fly and join the ancient, elite society of flying chipmunks. 
 
 
Controls:

  •  Left/Right Arrows - movement 
  • Up Arrow - Jump/ Climb up / Hold down to hover while mid-air 
  • Down Arrow - Climb down 
  • X Button - Spit out nuts 

 
 
Instructions: * Nuts can be used as projectile weapons to blast the enemy crows * Berries grants you both health and ammunition with the seeds 
 
 
Credits:

 Tyler Rankin: Programming/ Concept Design/ Voice of Chippy (website) 

Robert Stuart: Level Design 

Nick Lanni: Artwork (YouTube) 

Morgan Casey: Music/ SFX (website)
